titleStmt.title: Aqua triumphalis, being a true relation of the honourable the city of Londons entertaining Their Sacred Majesties upon the river of Thames and wellcoming them from Hampton-Court to White-Hall expressed and set forth in severall shews and pageants the 23. day of August, 1662 / vvritten by John Tatham, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author by T. Childe and L. Parry ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
